ja521:9.1: tapokammaṃ → tape kammaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja521:11.1: tāta alakkhī ca → sirī ca tāta lakkhī ca (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja521:13.1: tvaṃ sabbesu suhadayo → so tvaṃ sabbesaṃ suhadayo (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | so tvaṃ sabbe suhadayo (mr)
ja521:16.3: Uṭṭhāhato → uṭṭhahato (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed), appamajjato → mappamajjato (mr)
ja521:19.1: Sakkhisi tvaṃ → sakkhī tuvaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | sakkhi tuvaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja521:30.5: Sīlavāssu → sīlavassu (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | sīlavāssa (ṭīkā)
ja521:31.1: Apucchimha kosiyagottaṃ → apucchimhā kosiyagottaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | apucchamhāpi kosikaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja521:31.3: Tvaṃ dāni vadehi jambuka → jambuka tvaṃdāni vadehi (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja521:38.1: Paññāva sutaṃ vinicchinī → paññā sutavinicchinī (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja521:40.4: kammaphalaṃ tassijjhati → tamphalaṃ tassa ijjhati (bj) | kammaphalaṃ tassa ijjhati (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, csp1ed) | phalaṃ tassa samijjhati (mr)
ja521:52.2: dhammo ciṇṇo sukhāvaho → dhammo suciṇṇo sukhamāvahati (mr)
